issue.title: [Python] Correct flake8 errors outside of pyarrow/ directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2395](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2395). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix flake8 warnings for files outside of benchmarks directory.
